Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Hello, The battery level is already at 84% although I bought it in excellent condition. Unfortunately, the battery doesn't hold.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
AS
